text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GM-ES74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GM-ES74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GM-ES74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Apex Legends. The build quality of the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GM-ES74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS TUF Gaming FX504GM-ES74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB PCIe NVMe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!
